wikipedia_page.main: Steve Brennan (3 September 1958 – 13 August 2015) was an English professional footballer who played as a midfielder in the Football League for Crystal Palace and Plymouth Argyle before moving into non-league football with Leatherhead.

response: *Steve Brennan (American reporter) (c. 1952–2009), Irish-born American reporter, journalist, and editor of The Hollywood Reporter
